attributes.action: Prevent the use of firearms on the streets of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland by any individual citizen except for those members of the police and the security forces who have the right to defend the UK populace against acts of violence which endanger their day to day existence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please stop the increasing use of gun crime in our cities by instigating an automatic prison sentence of no less than 10 years for the possession and use of an unlicensed firearm

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
